details: The skill gives users a generic summary on when buses are arriving at stops based on what users configure their Alexa to. This skill assumes that users know which buses and stops to configure their skills on, and gets schedule information from the MBTA live website. Please visit https://www.mbta.com/schedules/bus to find your stop and record your stop ID from the URL for configuration.

title: Sports Illustrated Play
example.1: “Alexa, ask My Coach when's my next game?”
example.2: “Alexa, ask My Coach to get the last team message”
example.3: “Alexa, ask My Coach about weather for the next game”
details: Sports Illustrated Play is a leading sports team and league management system, now providing schedules, communications, and more to busy coaches and youth sports families in an easy-to-use skill. The SI Play skill is free and can be used with any team or club using the SI Play Mobile App!What Features are integrated with Alexa?- Ask for upcoming game times & location- Create games or practices (coach only)- Get event location info, including weather updates- Send a team chat and check most recent chat conversationsABOUT SI PLAYSI Play is smart sport technology designed to simplify your hectic sports life while also celebrating the stories, moments, and goodness of sport.Our powerful suite of sports management tools are designed to help youth sports leagues and teams – plus the coaches, parents and fans that support them – operate with peak efficiency throughout their season. Online registration and payments, league & team websites, scheduling, communications, digital player passes, live scoring and much more, all fully integrated from desktop to mobile app.Whether you win, lose, or are just having fun, we believe in the power of PLAY. And as team parents, coaches, tournament directors, and league administrators ourselves, we know what it takes to make it all happen. Simplify & Celebrate Your Sports Life!To find out more about SI Play's league and team management services, visit: www.siplay.com

title: My Coach
example.2: “Alexa, ask my coach for a chest workout.”
example.3: “Alexa, ask my coach for a cardio workout.”
details: My Coach offers motivation as you are guided through your choice of chest, legs, abs, and cardio workouts that can be done in around 7 minutes minutes and require no additional fitness equipment. To prevent boredom the exercises for each workout are on seven day rotations.  **Each day after you complete a workout you will be notified of what tomorrows workout is** Also if you have suggestions for exercise you would like added in let me know, I'll listen. Below is one day of exercise: Chest (7 minutes)    Standard Pushups (1 minute)Wide Grip Pushups (1 Minute)Full Plank (1 Minute)Standard Pushups (1 Minute)Narrow Grip Pushups (1 Minute)*30 Second rest between setsAbs (5minutes 40 seconds)Elbow Plank (1 Minute)Full Plank (1 Minute)Crunches (1 Minute)Leg Raisers (30 seconds each arm)Elbow Plank(1 Minute)*10 second rest between setsLegs (Su-Tu-Th Low Impact) (7 minutes)Calf Raisers (1 minute)Single Leg (Wall Assisted Squats) (1 Minute)Wall Sit (1 Minute)Lunges (1 Minute)*30 seconds between setsLegs (Mon-Wed-Fri-Sat) Plyometrics) (7 minutes)Jump Squats(1 Minute)Jumping Jacks(1 Minute)Frog Hops (1 Minute)Wall Sit ( 1 Minute)Knee Jumps (1 Minute)Cardio (7 minutes 10 seconds)Jog in place (1 Minute)Run in place (1 Minute)Jog in Place (30 seconds)Jump Squats (1 Minute)Jog in Place (30 seconds)Burpees (30 seconds)Jumping Jacks (30 Seconds)High Knee Jumps(30 Seconds)Jog in place (20 seconds)High Knee Jumps (30 Seconds )Jog in Place (20 Seconds)High knee Jumps (10 seconds)Cool Down (20 Seconds *no breaks

title: what to eat
details: Are you tired of waiting 30 minutes to choose what to eat with your friends? No need to worry, just ask Alexa and her food expert skill. title: Food Expert by Selectivor
example.3: “Can someone on a ketogenic diet eat couscous?”
details: Always know what everyone can eat and their favorite foods - without the hassle of remembering complex food lists!Wondering if an ingredient is OK for specific diets or food allergies?		*Say “Alexa, open Food Expert”, then ask “Is brown rice OK for someone on a vegan diet and gluten-free diet?” OR “Is tomato juice OK for someone on a heartburn and paleo diet?”		*Say “Alexa, open Food Expert”, then ask “Can someone allergic to peanuts have walnuts?”Unlock PERSONALIZED features by linking your FREE Selectivor profile to Food Expert:		*Say “Alexa, ask Food Expert is hummus OK for me”  		*Say “Alexa, open Food Expert”, then ask “Is bacon OK for my team?"                *“What are Oliver Smith’s favorite foods?”HOW TO LINK YOUR SELECTIVOR PROFILE WITH FOOD EXPERT:1. Create your free Selectivor profile by opening Selectivor on the Alexa app (click "Enable"), OR at Selectivor.com, OR via the Selectivor mobile app (App Store or Google Play Store). NOTE: If you use Facebook sign-in with Selectivor, be sure you create a Selectivor password. Complete your personal eating profile and invite friends and family to join as Selectivor contacts. 2. Come back to the Alexa app and link your Selectivor profile by clicking "Settings" then "Link Account." Use your Selectivor username and password and you'll be all set.3. You're ready to eat! Wasn't that easy?IMPORTANT DISCLAIMER: 	By using this Skill, you agree to our full Terms and Disclaimer.	Food Expert by Selectivor does not provide medical advice and is not a substitute for consultation and advice provided by a qualified and licensed health professional. Always verify all foods with the manufacturer and your health professional prior to consuming, serving or recommending. Medical Disclaimer	http://eat.selectivor.com/selectivor-terms/#1501277543994-2269f7b8-5923TROUBLESHOOTING 	*Try different sentence structures. For example, “Can I eat mango?” and “Is mango OK for me?”	*Try different versions of food names - some foods may be more specific and others more general. For example, “lean chicken meat” or “chicken breast”.	*Check your Selectivor contacts to verify you’re using the exact person or group’s name.	*Speak very slowly and clearly, especially with names of people or foods.	*Kindly use our mobile app to send us feedback, ideas and improvements.

title: Beautiful Piano: Relaxing Sound
details: Beautiful Piano music is a perfect background sound for studying, working, reading or writing. It helps to concentrate, relieve stress and improve productivity.How to use "Beautiful Piano: Relaxing Sound"?You can say:- "Alexa, open Beautiful Piano"- "Alexa, start Beautiful Piano"- "Alexa, play Beautiful Piano"It will automatically play the sound indefinitely until you say "Alexa, stop".How to set a timer?First, you need to play the sound using one of the above method. Then, you can limit the time the sound will play by saying "Alexa, stop playing in 1 hour" (or however long you want it to last). Once 1 hour has passed, the sound will stop playing.How to support us?Your review is extremely important and it shows us your support. Please consider leaving a review if you love the skill. Your review encourages us to continue making more skills.Listen to more relaxing sounds?You can search in the Alexa Skill store the following skills:- Zen Spa- Forest Birdsong- Forest Birds- Study Music- Zen Meditation- Beautiful Piano- Forest Campfire- Stress Relief- Tropical Birds- Waves Sandy Beach- Morning Tweet Tweet- Focus Music- Cave Water Drips- Public Park- Tribal Festival

title: Q-Code
example.1: “Alexa, ask Q Code about Q R Z”
details: Q-Codes or Q-signals are a three letter shorthand for common ham radio expressions used on the air.  Many Q-Codes relate to CW (continous wave).They are sepecially useful in Morse code.  Often in phone (voice communication) they are considered a bit to much like jargon and are discouraged.  They are helpful when used between ham's that don't speak a common language.

title: HAM Radio Q Codes
example.3: “Alexa, ask q code for a code.”
details: Ham Radio Q Codes are abbreviations which are often used in HAM Radio.  Use this app to review HAM Radio Q-Codes and their meanings..

title: Sleep Help
details: Use this skill to learn how to perform a yogic breathing pattern known to help with calmness and achieving sleep. This is the same breathing technique and pattern promoted by Dr. Andrew Weil, commonly known as 4-7-8 breathing. The technique is immediately effective for calming and achieving a drowsy state, but its effectiveness is dramatically increased with practice and regular use. Use this skill to master the breathing pattern until you can perform this totally on your own.Good fortunes to you and pleasant dreams!If you like this skill, please give it a 5-star rating so that others may find it and sleep better.

title: Sleep Help

title: Elementary Math
details: Test your mathematics knowledge with some elementary school mathematics. The questions are a mix of addition, subtraction and multiplication.

title: Elementary Math
example.2: “Alexa, ask Elementary Math to practice multiplication.”
example.3: “Alexa, tell Elementary Math to set difficulty to medium.”
details: Elementary Math is a skill that allows children in grades 1 through 4 to practice basic math questions. The skill will ask what kind of math should be practiced in a session. The choices are addition, subtraction, multiplication, or division. Once a choice is made, the skill generates 5 questions on that type of problem. Each response is marked correct or incorrect and instant feedback is given. The results of a session are stored so that the user is reminded what he or she worked on last time. To start the skill, or a new session, say "Open Elementary Math". After that, the skill will guide the user on what kind of math questions to practice. You can set the difficulty level to easy (default), medium, or hard.

title: International Space Station (ISS) Video Stream
details: The International Space Station (ISS) streaming live from space!Features internal views of the ISS, and external views of the station and Earth.Listen carefully and you may overhear the astronauts talking.If the screen is dark or blue, the ISS stream may be experiencing a temporary loss of signal with the earth... or it may be on the dark side of the planet.  Check back later.Questions, comments, concerns?  Email iss-video@cdl.lc

title: Word Scramble
example.2: “Alexa, ask word scramble to give me a word”
example.3: “Alexa, ask word scramble to tell me about the rules”
details: Word scramble is a great game to test your vocabulary! Simply say "Alexa, ask word scramble to play", it will give you a random sequence of alphabetical letters, then you will have 20 seconds to figure out which word these letters can form. For example, if you hear  "a, l, p, e, p", after 20 seconds, you can answer "it's apple", or say "I don't know" to get the answer.

title: Word Scramble
details: Word Scramble is designed to exercise your attention and short-term memory, which are important factors for career success. Far too many people experience a decline in working memory as they age. Keep your short-term memory sharp with a daily Word Scramble! And get familiar with Alexa too!Do you have a longer attention-span than your kids? Are you a better listener than your husband? Are you better at remembering things than your wife? Take thirty seconds or so and find out!Four random numbers will be listed and the challenge is to say them in reverse order. And then the same for four colors, four animals, and finally four flowers. There are 21 possible numbers, 9 possible colors, 23 possible animals and 11 possible flowers.At the end of each session, games won and lost will be reported.If you enjoy this game, please remember to rate and review.

example.3: “Alexa, ask Six Pack Abs to start workout”
details: Work out with Alexa throughout the week. Once you open the skill, just ask Alexa to start the workout. You can also ask Alexa for your progress.This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.

title: How to Get Six Pack Abs
details: You aspire to have a perfect six pack abs.You want to six pack or 8 pack abs will not be too far away for you if you do these abs exercise.No need equipment, no need for expensive gyms, not too expensive, do not spend too much time moving. To use this skill just say "Alexa six pack abs" and Alexa will take care of they rest!These tips include a variety of different subjects. Such as workout routines, how to eat less, gain muscle, lose fat, and finally get rid of that belly fat. We hope this skill helps you enjoy yourself next time you're at the beach :)Requests:If you want to talk, over ways to improve, feel free to reach out at dvirftw at gmail dot comSHOW YOUR SUPPORT:If you love How to get six pack abs, please give it a 5-star rating in the Alexa app. If you think it isn't worthy of a 5-star rating please let us know how we can make it better by sending us an email at support@xmobmedia.com.
